full_text:
Re: News 12 Inquiry- Jeffrey Epstein
From Lee Plourde
To BRO/Exec Assistant~
Date 2019/07/25 07:45
Subject: Re: News 12 Inquiry- Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thank you. We are not commenting on any inquiry. Central office will be addressing These.
Thanks.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
